con:testStep.name: Get Temp Password
con:testStep.con:description: Paste here the temporary password sent to the user.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Paste here the temporary password sent to the user.
A valid 6 digit code should be entered.

con:request.name: Login - User must change password (Reset)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:Login> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Get Temp Password#Result}${Get DUO Code (5)#Result}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> </tem:request> </tem:Login> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ChangePassword (Reset)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ChangePassword> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Get Temp Password#Result}${Get DUO Code (5)#Result}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:NewPassword>Myp@ssw0rd!4</acr1:NewPassword> </tem:request> </tem:ChangePassword> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:expectedResult: A valid 6 digit code should be entered.
